entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:57 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
